getExpectedEmber(uint256,uint256).details: Frontend should call Kyber API for actual quote

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.kyberData: Encoded swap data from Kyber API
params.tokenIn: Token to swap from (address(0) for ETH)

getExpectedEmber(uint256,uint256).notice: Get quote for swap (view function for frontend)

zapAndCreateMarket(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Zap any token to EMBER and create a market

zapAndSubmitEntry(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Zap any token to EMBER and submit entry

zapAndVote(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Zap any token to EMBER and vote
